//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	use ( "guard2" );
}

wait ( 500.000 );

affect ( "guard2", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_SEARCH_OFF", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "3 - TakeYourTime" );

	task ( "spot" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "cig_spot01" );
	}

	dowait ( "spot" );
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "ON" );
	set ( "SET_LOOK_POINT", < 0.000 135.000 0.000 > );
	signal ( "cig is here" );
}
